Captain Minnie poses on board Disney's newest cruise ship The Wish.
It's been a decade since Disney has expanded its cruise fleet. Its newest addition, set to launch in a couple weeks, is a 1,119-fo… [+10535 chars]

articles.title: Tom Hiddleston Is Officially Having A Kid With MCU Villain - Inside the Magic
articles.description: Tom Hiddleston is having a baby with someone who will be playing a villain in an upcoming MCU movie arriving next year.
articles.content:
Tom Hiddleston will soon be a father, but fans might be surprised to learn that Hiddleston’s partner is going to be a villain in the MCU.
Credit: Marvel Studios

articles.title: Cameron Diaz to 'un-retire' from acting with Jamie Foxx film - BBC
articles.description: The star officially quit making movies in 2018 but will now be re-united on-screen with Jamie Foxx.
articles.content:
Cameron Diaz is to come out of acting retirement to star in a new movie, the suitably-titled Back in Action, alongside Jamie Foxx.
